title: BRIEF-Metro Alliance Holdings & Equities Announces Renato B. Magadia's Cessation As Chairman & President
text:
BRIEF-Metro Alliance Holdings & Equities Announces Renato B. Magadia's Cessation As Chairman & President

Stock Markets 3 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 09:32)

BRIEF-Metro Alliance Holdings & Equities Announces Renato B. Magadia's Cessation As Chairman & President Oct 21 (Reuters) - Metro Alliance Holdings & Equities Corp

MAH.PS :

* ANNOUNCES RENATO B. MAGADIA'S CESSATION OF TERM OF OFFICE

AS

CHAIRMAN AND PRESIDENT DUE TO HIS DEATH



Source text for Eikon: company coverage: MAH.PS





BRIEF-Metro Alliance Holdings & Equities Announces Renato B. Magadia's Cessation As Chairman & President
